content:
# We have successfully gathered 10 units of iron ore, bringing our inventory to 10 iron ore, 15 coal, and 5 stone.
# However, the first furnace remains idle with no ingredients to smelt, while the copper furnace is still processing copper ore but has not produced any new copper plates.

# To resolve the issue with the first furnace, we should insert the gathered iron ore into it to start producing iron plates again.
# Additionally, we should check the copper furnace to ensure it has enough resources to continue smelting.

# Let's first insert the iron ore into the first furnace to get the iron plate production back on track.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace_iron, quantity=10)  # Insert iron ore into the first furnace

# After inserting the iron ore, we will also check the copper furnace to see if it can continue processing the remaining copper ore.
insert_item(Prototype.CopperOre, furnace_copper, quantity=10)  # Insert the remaining copper ore into the copper furnace

# Now that both furnaces have their respective resources, we will check the inventory.
print(f"Final Inventory: {inspect_inventory()} after inserting iron and copper ore into furnaces.")  # Check inventory after inserting

# Finally, we will monitor both furnaces for a maximum of 30 seconds to see if they produce their respective plates.
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum wait time for smelting
    iron_plates = inspect_inventory(furnace_iron)[Prototype.IronPlate]
    copper_plates = inspect_inventory(furnace_copper)[Prototype.CopperPlate]
    if iron_plates >= 2 and copper_plates >= 2:  # Check if we have produced at least 2 plates of each
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check inputs.")

# Finally, we should check the inventory and status of the entities again after the smelting attempt.
print(f"Final Inventory: {inspect_inventory()} after smelting iron and copper plates.")  # Final inventory check
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()} after production status.")  # Check entity status once more.
